mapper.select: SELECT ca.name CAT_NAME, co.course_id, co.title, co.short_description, co.period, co.price, co.thumbnail, a.name ADM_NAME, a.avatar FROM courses co JOIN category ca ON ca.category_id = co.category_id JOIN admins a ON co.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE co.course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT pa.payment_method, pa.created_at, pa.payment_code, pa.phone_number, pa.name, pa.payment_id, pa.course_id, ca.name CAT_NAME, co.title, co.short_description, co.thumbnail, co.period, co.price, a.name ADM_NAME, a.avatar FROM courses co JOIN payment pa ON pa.course_id = co.course_id JOIN category ca ON ca.category_id = co.category_id JOIN admins a ON co.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE co.course_id = #{courseId} AND pa.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM courses co JOIN payment pa ON pa.course_id = co.course_id JOIN category ca ON ca.category_id = co.category_id JOIN admins a ON co.admin_id = a.admin_id WHERE co.course_id = #{courseId} AND pa.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment VALUES (seq_payment.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{courseId}, 'kakao', #{price}, '결제 완료', #{phone_number}, #{name}, DEFAULT, #{imp_uid})
mapper.select: SELECT pa.payment_id, pa.payment_code, pa.name, pa.price, pa.payment_state, pa.payment_method, pa.created_at, co.title FROM payment pa JOIN courses co ON pa.price = co.price
